page.title: 13GT. WAKERINGS COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: THERE ARE TWO MAIN FORMS OF COMMUNICATIONS THEY ARE THE TELEPHONE SYSTEM AND THE LETTER POST. THE LOCAL TELEPHONE EXCHANGE IS TOTALLY AUTOMATIC AND COMES UNDER THE SOUTHEND AREA. THE CODE IS 0702 AND THE GREAT WAKERING NUMBERS START WITH 217,218,219 AND THE NEW ONE IS 216.THE PUBLIC TELEPHONES OPERATE WITH 10p. COINS BUT MOST OF THEM ARE IN A BAD STATE OF DISREPAIR. MOST PRIVATE HOMES, SHOPS AND PUBLIC HOUSES HAVE THEIR OWN TELEPHONE. THE LETTER POST IS COLLECTED FROM POST BOXES POSITIONED AT CONVENIENT PLACES THROUGHOUT OUR AREA. ALL OUR POST BOXES ARE RED SOME ARE ROUND AND SOME OF THE SMALLER ONES ARE SQUARE. MOST OF THEM HAVE E.R. ON THEM. THE POST IS COLLECTED FROM THE POST BOXES EVERY WEEKDAY AT 9.30 A.M AND 4.30P.M. AND 4.45 P.M. ON SATURDAYS.
